HeroSection.one-stop platform: As the one-stop platform connecting restaurants and suppliers, we bring the food industry together, so that you can focus on doing what you do best.

Facts.Leave the mess in the kitchen: Leave the mess in the kitchen
Facts.We bring restaurants and suppliers toget: We bring restaurants and suppliers together so you can do it all in one spot. Chat with your business partners, track orders in real time, and discover whats out there (all of it)
Facts.Save tou money, save you time: Save you money, save you time, and save you stress. We decrease order errors by 62%. Skip the endless phone calls, get organized, and focus on what you know best: amazing food.
Facts.In the food industry, reliability is key: In the food industry, reliability is key. We promise the transparency you need to trust the guys on the other end and build reliable partnerships.

ForRestaurantsSection.We cut your workload in half: We cut your workload in half. The days of screw ups are over. Order in three clicks, contact with suppliers at your fingertips, and track your items as they drive towards you. And did we mention it’s free?

ForSuppliersSection.By making the process easier for restaur: By making the process easier for restaurants, we increase the amount of items in their cart and orders placed. We remove the hassle so that you can grow your revenue and build a solid customer base

Carousel.Quote 1: One of the most important things is being able to talk with my suppliers and building that trust. When I know their food is fantastic and they’re reliable, it cuts down on time and money I spend shopping and trying new products.
Carousel.Chef 1: Chef Khaled Benmoussa I  La Saveur d'Alger I El Biar, Algiers
Carousel.Quote 2: In the past, sending orders was a struggle, but today it’s automated and simple; the results are truly remarkable.
Carousel.Chef 2: Chef Yacine Boukhalfa I  L'Étoile Culinaire I Kouba, Algiers
Carousel.Quote 3: Since we started using Fournili, the time of placing an order reduced by one hour, and wrong items (delivery) dropped to zero.
Carousel.Chef 3: Chef Riad Mansouri I  LAl-Nakha Al-Sharqiya I Telemly, Algiers
